member.name: M:RbControls.Display.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a control rendering context, using RbEngine.Rendering.Renderer.CreateControlContext(). Sets up the control styles from that, then does the usual InitializeComponent() thing

member.name: M:RbControls.Display.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:RbControls.Display.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:RbControls.Display.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Does nothing - rendering of everything, including background, is done through the renderer

member.name: M:RbControls.Display.SetupViewport
member.summary: Sets up the control rendering viewport

member.name: M:RbControls.Display.Draw
member.summary: Draws the contents of the control

member.name: P:RbControls.Display.CreateParams
member.summary: Override control creation parameters to support OpenGL requirements

member.name: P:RbControls.Display.ColourBits
member.summary: Sets the colour depth of the control

member.name: P:RbControls.Display.DepthBits
member.summary: Sets the number of depth bits used by the control

member.name: P:RbControls.Display.StencilBits
member.summary: Sets the number of stencil bits used by the control
